item.title: Tailscale Session Recorder Architecture
item.description: Overview This diagram illustrates the architecture and data flow of Tailscale’s SSH session recording feature, showing how terminal sessions are captured, streamed, and stored securely within a tailnet. graph TB subgraph "User Workstation" U[User] -->|SSH Connection| TC[Tailscale Client] end subgraph "Tailscale SSH Server Node" TC -->|WireGuard Tunnel| TS[Tailscale SSH Server] TS --> SR[Session Recorder Client] SR --> TIO[Terminal I/O Wrapper] TIO --> ASC[Asciinema Formatter] end subgraph "Control Plane" CP[Coordination Server] -.
